page.title: 05THE AIRE VALLEY TRUNK ROAD
page.content: Over the last few years the A650 from {Bradford}to{Keighley}has been crowded by cars. Due to the congestion and the many accidents, people living between{ {Bradford}and{Keighley,}like those in {Cottingley }and {Bingley,}have been told a new Trunk Road may be built. We interviewed two people to find out their views on the Trunk Road. We interviewed the owner of a garage in Cottingley. He said, "The business will not prosper, but it will not be any worse." He also said, "I think it will go ahead." Then we interviewed someone whose house is in direct line of the expected route. He thinks it will not ease any problems because the proposed Trunk Road will stop before the{ {SALTAIRE ROUNDABOUT,}which leads to one of the main roads going into BRADFORD.
